title: You shouldnt lose elo if....
body: Theres a leaver/afker in your team. Its pointless. Why should we lose elo if we are permanetley disadvantaged for the whole game.

replies.body:
Ugh guess it's my time to remind/fill someone in on the obvious. If player A is duoing with player B and one of them (or another team member) is doing badly one of them can just quit the game saving their duo's elo.

EDIT.

And what would happen to the elo of the winning team? Would they be denied gaining points because you don't want to lose yours?

He said the whole game. And surely Riot could detect whether it's a duo and punish both players, or make the duo exempt from mmr immunity.
Thats a different type of AFK. I'm talking about the ones that didnt even connect on the waiting screen and never connected during the whole game. Its different

Like DGS said.

It's abusable.

And because it is, it wont be implemented because for as many legitimate players as there is, there are many desperate players that would take advantage of any small way to increase their gain and cut any/if not all of their losses.
